Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Housing and Buildings
A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to power-operated and power-assisted doors
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the installation of protective devices for seniors and persons with a disability who reside in multiple dwellings, and the provision of a tax abatement for certain related installations
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Installation of protective devices for seniors and persons with a disability who reside in multiple dwellings, and the provision of a tax abatement for certain related installations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to evictions of disabled tenants
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.5102/A.1475, which would allow municipalities and localities that have a senior citizen rent increase exemption program to establish an automatic enrollment program for eligible seniors to be automatically enrolled or automatically re-enrolled in the program.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Municipalities and localities that have a senior citizen rent increase exemption program to establish an automatic enrollment program for eligible seniors to be automatically enrolled or automatically re-enrolled in the program. (S.5102/A.1475)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a percentage of dwelling units receiving city financial assistance to be universal design units
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring a percentage of dwelling units receiving city financial assistance to be universal design units.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to ensuring compliance with accessibility requirements in submitted building construction and renovation plans
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Ensuring compliance with accessibility requirements in submitted building construction and renovation plans.
